sentences.english: The wounded soldier opened his eyes once, but lost consciousness again immediately.
sentences.chinese: 那个伤员睁了一下眼晴随即又昏了过去。

sentences.english: Two of the seriously injured were transferred to a better hospital for treatment of medical conditions.
sentences.chinese: 其中两名重伤员被转运到医疗条件更好的医院治疗。

sentences.english: When fracture of the wounded lower limbs is secured, limbs wants curved move to show bend ancon unbend to bind.
sentences.chinese: 伤员下肢骨折固定时，肢体要弯着呈屈肘状伸直捆绑。

sentences.english: Many untreated wounds are becoming infected, leading to amputations.
sentences.chinese: 许多未经治疗的伤员正遭受感染，会导致截肢。

sentences.english: For aeromedical evacuations, it can carry 74 litter patients and two medical attendants.
sentences.chinese: 在撤离伤员时，可以搭载74名患者和2名医生。

sentences.english: They did their marketingvisabdomining exercisesle to help the sick using the wounded.
sentences.chinese: 他们尽了最大的悉力帮助病号和伤员。

sentences.english: "I'm glad I wasn't in it. " one of the patients muttered.
sentences.chinese: “幸亏我没赶上”，一个伤员唧咕了一句。

sentences.english: Combeferre, wearing an apron, was dressing the wounds.
sentences.chinese: 公白飞腰间围着围腰，在包扎伤员。

sentences.english: Dongshuji of green county with the transfer of the wounded, they take the pursuer.
sentences.chinese: 青顺县的董书记带着伤员转移，他们甩开了追军。

sentences.english: The wounded every the moment are taken to clinics dotted ingl around city.
sentences.chinese: 目前伤员们只能往零星漫衍在市里的诊所送。

sentences.english: Wherever he went, the wound soldier left behind him a trail of blood.
sentences.chinese: 伤员所到之处，都留下道道血迹。

sentences.english: Mi-4 helicopters were mainly used for intelligence service and evacuation of the wounded.
sentences.chinese: 4直升机主要被用于情报工作和疏散伤员。

sentences.english: They did their wise to help the sick and the wounded.
sentences.chinese: 他们尽了最大的悉力补助病号和伤员。

sentences.english: She quit and escorted the wounded man back.
sentences.chinese: 她退出了比赛护送伤员回去。

sentences.english: She shielded the wounded soldier from the strafing of the enemy plane with her own body.
sentences.chinese: 在敌机扫射时，她用自己的身子护住伤员。
